# VRA-INIT serivce

For syncing to run "cloud-init" after set network by aria automation

## Binary Topology

 - /usr/bin/vra-init
 - /usr/bin/vra-ready
 - /usr/bin/image-clear-poweroff
 - /lib/systemd/system/vra-init.service

## Base64 Encoded

```
VRA_INIT_SVC=""
VRA_INIT=""
VRA_READY=""
IMG_CL_PO=""
```
